aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.subtitle: Experience that Makes a Difference
aboutSection.description: At Al-Amin Landscape, we specialize in innovative landscaping services that add beauty and elegance to any space. We provide integrated solutions for designing and implementing villa gardens, public spaces, and playgrounds, along with supplying ornamental plants, turf (artificial, natural), flowers, fruit trees, and all hardscape equipment such as sprinklers, sand, and interlock. We also focus on garden maintenance and irrigation network development to ensure a perfect, lasting look. Our vision is to transform your spaces into vibrant oases because we believe nature is the secret of inspiration and beauty.
aboutSection.learnMoreAria: Learn more about Al-Amin Landscape services
aboutSection.imageAlt: Image of a garden or landscape design

servicesSection.title: Our Services Pulse with Beauty
servicesSection.description: At Al-Ameen, we specialize in providing integrated solutions for gardens and outdoor spaces. Our services include garden design and landscaping, installation of waterfalls and pergolas, irrigation network implementation, playgrounds, agricultural decorations, and supply of high-quality landscaping materials. We work with skilled hands and the latest technologies to transform your space into a vibrant oasis.

workSteps.title: Work Steps at El Amen Landscape

steps.title: Consultation and Planning
steps.description: We start our journey with you by understanding your vision and your special needs for the green space. We visit the site, discuss ideas and proposals to develop a comprehensive design plan that fits your aspirations and needs.

steps.title: Creative Design
steps.description: We design the space innovatively combining beauty and functional practicality. We use the latest technologies and best tools to create distinctive designs that suit the nature of the place and reflect your unique personality.

steps.title: Professional Implementation
steps.description: The project is executed by a highly experienced specialized team. We care about every detail, from soil preparation and planting to installing modern irrigation networks, adhering to quality and deadlines.

steps.title: Maintenance and Follow-up
steps.description: We ensure the continuity of the space's beauty through periodic maintenance services including plant pruning, weed removal, and irrigation system inspection. We stay with you to keep your green space always in the best condition.

modal.description: With more than 15 years of experience in landscaping, Engineer Amin has led many major projects that combined creativity and precision in implementation. His journey with the world of landscaping began from his great passion for nature and green spaces.
modal.conclusion: Engineer Amin always seeks development and innovation in the field of landscaping, focusing on using the latest technologies and global methods to provide the best results for clients.

garden_design.title: Garden Design & Landscaping
garden_design.short_desc: Home garden landscaping using the best materials and designs.
garden_design.full_desc: We provide artificial grass installation services at the highest level for all our customers. We offer various types, whether ground grass or wall grass, in all its colors and diverse densities, which are chosen according to the customer's opinion with the instructions of the specialized engineer to determine the location where the grass is to be installed. The installation of artificial grass differs inside homes from gardens of homes, palaces, and villas, public gardens, and clubs. Wall grass and low-density grass are preferred inside homes, while medium-density grass is installed in gardens of homes, palaces, and villas. High-density grass is used in clubs and public gardens to withstand pressure. The company does not rely on one fixed method of installation but innovates everything new and modern to appear appropriate and attractive, captivating eyes and enchanting hearts. It is cut into beautiful shapes that suit the customer's taste, such as square and circular shapes, making the garden an artistic painting of great beauty. Al-Ameen Landscaping relies in its work on the best tools and wonderful technological devices to measure spaces, compact the ground, and install grass with great precision and speed.

waterfalls.title: Artificial Waterfalls
waterfalls.short_desc: Design and installation of all types of waterfalls.
waterfalls.full_desc: We provide artificial waterfall installation services in gardens of palaces, villas, public gardens, and inside and outside homes to decorate them, increase their value, and add an aesthetic touch. We offer a diverse selection of types, including (classical waterfalls, wall waterfalls, musical waterfalls, decorative waterfalls, and others). We use many different materials in making waterfalls, such as (stones, porcelain, ceramic, marble, and others). The type, shape, and material used in making the waterfall are chosen based on the customer's desire and choice. Al-Ameen Landscaping offers its strongest offers and best prices for waterfalls. Some may think that designing and installing artificial waterfalls requires large spaces and a lot of money, but this belief is wrong. Waterfalls can be installed anywhere inside and outside homes, in any available space. The company provides several different sizes (small - medium - large) to suit various spaces. If the space is not suitable for installing a waterfall, a suspended or wall waterfall is designed, which is installed on walls and only needs a small basin to pour its water.

pergolas.title: Pergolas & Shades
pergolas.short_desc: Installation of high-quality pergolas and shades.
pergolas.full_desc: The installation service of shades, fences, and pergolas is one of our company's essential works. We provide them in different shapes and sizes suitable for many purposes. We offer shades of various types and shapes, such as (car shades, palace shades, school shades, pool shades, mosque shades, garden shades, parking shades, movable shades, and tensile shades). They are manufactured from different materials according to the customer's opinion, such as (metal, iron, wood, plastic, fabric). We provide many types of fences, including (iron fences, plastic fences, iron slat fences, iron braided fences, plastic slat fences, plastic braided fences, shanko fences, fabric fences, aluminum fences, and wooden fences). In addition to many types of pergolas, such as (wooden pergolas, iron pergolas, plastic pergolas, fabric pergolas, and lexan pergolas), and others. We install them all according to modern methods and innovative ways with maximum speed, efficiency, and accuracy in the shortest possible time.

irrigation.title: Irrigation Networks
irrigation.short_desc: Modern irrigation networks with drip and spray systems.
irrigation.full_desc: We provide irrigation network services for gardens of homes, palaces, villas, and public gardens. We offer all the basics of agricultural plumbing, all different irrigation equipment, drip irrigation networks, and spray irrigation networks, which are chosen based on the nature of the land and the type of plants planted. We rely in our work on innovative and modern methods to design an ideal irrigation network capable of irrigating plants efficiently and correctly. Our role is not limited to installing irrigation networks only, but we also provide a specialized team to maintain these networks when they are damaged. We also provide monthly, quarterly, and semi-annual subscriptions to check on the irrigation system. We install irrigation networks by senior engineers and technicians according to industry standards and new installation methods.

sports_fields.title: Sports Fields
sports_fields.short_desc: Design and maintenance of sports fields.
sports_fields.full_desc: We provide installation, design, construction, and maintenance services for sports fields at the highest level, as we care about customer satisfaction. We provide excellent materials manufactured according to global quality specifications and authorized for safe use, fearing for individuals' health from exposure to any radioactive materials resulting from these substances. We rely on wonderful methods and new ideas in designing and implementing fields, adding everything new to them. We care about our customers' opinions first and strive to achieve their desires as desired. Al-Ameen Landscaping relies on technical materials and wonderful technological innovations, whether in ground excavation, leveling, or grass installation. We provide the strongest specialized technical staff with long experience and great skill in this field. We care about providing much effort, time, and money spent in designing fields. We are not only concerned with material gain but strive hard to build trust and a strong relationship between us and our customers through preparing and installing wonderful fields.

agricultural_decor.title: Agricultural Decorations
agricultural_decor.short_desc: Garden decorative designs using plants and natural stones.
agricultural_decor.full_desc: We design and install the most beautiful agricultural decorations for gardens and homes with the highest quality and the cheapest prices for agricultural decorations in Saudi Arabia. We have a large collection of agricultural decoration designs, whether for inside the home or for the home garden, using plants and natural and colored stones. Al-Ameen Landscaping also provides all services related to organizing, coordinating, and decorating gardens in general and home gardens in particular. The company also designs and implements all types of garden paths, whether stone, glass, colored gravel, stones, marble, and other types. All this and more is done through a prepared and trained work team of the best technicians and agricultural engineers with experience and training to deal with the best techniques and latest equipment in the field of agricultural decorations.

landscape_materials.title: Landscape Materials Supply
landscape_materials.short_desc: Supply of materials approved by major companies.
landscape_materials.full_desc: Al-Ameen Company is distinguished by providing all landscape materials, including pipes, sprinklers, hoses, elbows, cutting machines, and other landscape materials that are characterized by high quality because we are the official distributor of the largest modern irrigation system companies in Egypt, such as Hunter, Shaira, Al-Wadi, Al-Shami, Al-Masrya, and Nasico.

q1.question: What landscape services do you offer?
q1.answer: We offer a wide range of landscape services including garden design and implementation, automatic irrigation systems, residential and commercial garden landscaping, and green space care.

q2.question: How can I get a quote for my project?
q2.answer: You can contact us through the contact form or call us directly. We will arrange a site visit to assess the location and provide a detailed quote according to your needs.

q3.question: Do you provide periodic garden maintenance services?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide periodic maintenance services for gardens and green spaces with monthly or annual contracts that include irrigation, fertilization, pruning, and continuous care.

q4.question: What areas do your services cover?
q4.answer: We provide our services in all major governorates of Egypt with a focus on Greater Cairo, Alexandria, and the North Coast. We can also work on projects outside these areas as per agreement.
